page.title: 12RECREATION
page.content: There are not many Clubs in Perton itselcause of its relatively small population. There is a local Drame Group(Perton Players),Perton Angling Club,a Swimming Club(Perton Dippers- which use a local pool) and so on. For the children of Perton a Disco is usually held on a Saturday at the Community Centre. There is a Youth Club at the Community Centre which runs a number of activities for the children: for example; Table Tennis and Snooker. I think that there should be a Sports Hall in Perton so you would not have to go to Codsall just to play Tennis. Visiters to Perton could visit the two Public Houses here, take a walk alon the lakeside or simply sit on one of the benches and feed the Ducks.
